tool_description: This API allows you to add HWP(Hangul) document viewer and editing functions to your web service.
name: Polaris Office Web HWP
title: Polaris Office Web HWP

api_list.name: Generate Document Editor App
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polaris-office-web-hwp.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/documentApp/generateEditor/hwp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polaris-office-web-hwp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
